DOC.detailed_description: The aim study examine relationship optical blur poor refractive correction ( glass ) worker use computer productivity comfort workplace . We believe improve visual status subject use computer beneficial effect productivity visual comfort . All subject require complete vision screen charge decide qualify study . Subjects select frame worn period study . Subjects wear either best correction present prescription frame period 1-month . This double-blind study , mean neither subject doctor know pair glass subject wear part study . Subjects complete 4 hour test first period ( 4 week ) lenses switched second period ( 4 week ) . During test , subject complete two task standard computer . Either investigator co-investigator explain simple task . One task involve look print material enter correct information computer . The task involve find delete apostrophe manuscript computer . All subject answer short survey task check symptom result use computer . Before period , subject also answer another survey measure visual functioning use glass . The following periodic measurement make study : productivity accuracy enter list state population , search apostrophe ( ‘ ) document one state U.S . These task require 4 hour test two pair trial glass two period ( period last one month ) . Subjects asked return clinic 4 hr first 4-week period 4 hrs second 4-week period . At visit subject ask experienced undesirable reaction complete short survey . Subjects also require complete short 9-question survey determine visual comfort 1-hour work computer home job 1-month period study . These short phone survey take less 5-minutes complete arrange subject ’ convenience subject go work computer least 1-hr . This survey repeat five occasion . Finally , 3-months experimental portion study complete , subject require also answer short 9-question survey work computer . This also phone survey complete three occasion 1-hr work computer home job .
